issue.subject: Setting map center doesn't work for me (WMTS only map)
issue.description:
I try to set a map center.
My map contains only one WMTS layer.

In backend I set the center to : @532699, 152687@

But in FE the map is not centered where I want.
After DOM inspection :

appname.map.center (the application map definition)
@[532699, 152687]@

appname.mapPanel.map.center (the openlayers effective map...)
@Object { lon=660000,  lat=190000,  CLASS_NAME="OpenLayers.LonLat",  plus...}@

It seems to use the center on my WMTS layer (@"maxExtent": "new OpenLayers.Bounds(420000,30000,900000,350000)@)
@(900000+420000)/2 = 660000
(350000+30000) /2 = 190000@

details.name: subject

journals.notes:
With 
MaxExtent = 485869.5728, 76443.1884, 837076.5648, 299941.7864
(EPSG 21781 max extent)
it seems to work fine (same for #907).

Hi Hélène, you were right.
It works fine with this extend.
You can close it, thanks a lot!
